sources.title: 04 Pride Of The Bowery
sources.description: Hopefully this file represents a quality upgrade from other versions appearing here on the Internet Archive. from Wikipedia; Pride of the Bowery  is a black-and-white 1940 film and the fourth installment in the  East Side Kids  series. It was directed by  Joseph H. Lewis   and produced by  Sam Katzman . It was released by  Monogram Pictures  on December 15, 1940. Pride of the Bowery Theatrical poster Directed by Joseph H. Lewis Produced by Sam Katzman Written by William Lively Starring Leo Gorcey Bobby Jordan 'Sunshine Sammy' Morrison Donald Haines Distributed by Monogram Pictures Corporation Release dates December 15, 1940 Running time 68 minutes Language English
